title: When Baron Dies, Poros Should Come Flooding Out

replies.body: This has nothing to do with gameplay & balance, but I love it!

How? This is game breaking.
Without the poros, there's practically no reason to go for baron.
You're so right, baron is just click-bait without poro's.
Nah there is still the throwing the game reason
If Braum happens to be there, the poros should climb all over him while he laughs and starts juggling them or something.
What if we made Baron a giant Poro?
You want us to kill a giant poroâ€½ DOWNVOTE THIS MAN!

Vel' Koz is engrossed in anal...
Never forget.
Thoughts on Academy {{champion:103}}  Vel?
Well,he is a superb VILLAIN afterall.
Well.. He is.. a _superb villain_.
so that's why sej became op.
In case anyone doesn't get this reference, it is a reference to the "Blitzcrank's Poro Roundup" mobile/online game that Riot released.
Poros? You mispelled Boros:

You misspelled Bros.
{{champion:2}}

you misspelled hoes 
{{champion:40}}
{{champion:21}} *
janna is a prostitute or something like that

http://johnmannophoto.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/Smoking-Toaster.jpg

RIP Toaster Computers.
Oh you said "Rito" instead of "Riot" you're so funny. Not.
Killjoy...
what's "Riot"?
Beats me... Rito might know! :D
I suggest Poros when any of the Arcade skins get the last hit on Baron.
bump this one
When a team kills their 5th drag, it should explode into little dragon poros.

...If Blitzcrank lands the killing blow. ;)

Now THAT'S an easter egg!
Nah. SR should remain as ssilly free as possible. Any silly should be optional.
ALWAYS MORE SILLY! You know, what everyone else calls....fun.

Yeah, because Halo wasn't fun.

Wasn't silly enough.
Never played Halo, so I agree with that 100%. Though I would like to point out that everyone's favorite Mass Effect 3 DLC is Citadel...which gets rather silly, so you know...

Never played Mass Effect, so I can't really relate. Though i would like to point out that many people enjoyed Diablo... Which only gets rather silly during the rare cow level event, which again, is optional. Silly should ALWAYS be optional. Some people don't like it, and for those that do, you can play Legend of the Poro King. I prefer poros stay on the only-for-fun game modes.
And if Braum is present, all the poros form a powerful suit around him, giving him ranged basic attacks that instantly kill enemies because he shoots poros in their face.
this!....needs to happen ASAP

> [{quoted}](name=Prospector Pete,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4IPEXzhq,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-08-23T15:40:22.049+0000)

> Rito please

You have a weird fetish. You mean like "dead" poros who are already been digested by Baron's stomach?
no poros that survived and are escaping
This could happen in URF or some event on SR like BMB, but I don't think it should be on normal SR.

But Poros can't swim and Baron is in the River.

Unless...

Do we want to kill Poros?

Maybe Braum comes out of the sky and carries them to safety
What if you're braum? IMPOSTER
that would be nasty... have you ever killed a fly and see all the maggots come out?
You my friend are a genius.
Awesome idea, I like it!
